page.title: 17I LIVE AT THE POST OFFICE...
page.content: My name is Alex Rees. I live in{ {Blackpill Post Office.}I live on the outskirts of{Gower}near{Swansea.}I go to{Bishopston Comprehensive}and I am a 2nd year. My favourite subjects are{ {Chemistry}and{French.}I am also interested in{Computers.}I have a BBC'B 32K computer with DFS, speach chip, datasrcibe and a diskdrive. I enjoy programming and playing games. My other hobbies are Tae Kinon Do, self defence and I am a green belt. We live in a world of atomic bombs. President Reagan is working on a{Star {Wars}project to prevent a nuclear war. In America and Britain there's an AID's epidemic and it is spreading, 1000's of people have died. Drugs is a craze for youngsters. It costs about Â£3000 for 4 handfuls. ALEX REES 2P
